changes: Updated current phase from 'Fix Event Args Structure' to 'Update Rename Implementation'
file_insights.significance: Core status file tracking workflow progress and session metadata

patterns_discovered.pattern: Status File as Workflow State Machine
patterns_discovered.description: Project uses .auto-claude-status as a central state machine tracking planning→building progression
patterns_discovered.evidence: State field changed from 'planning' to 'building' indicating phase transition

patterns_discovered.description: Subtasks are tracked with completion counts against a total, enabling progress monitoring
patterns_discovered.evidence: Completed changed from 0 to 1 out of 10 total subtasks

patterns_discovered.description: Each work session is numbered sequentially with timestamps for audit trail
patterns_discovered.evidence: Session number incremented to 3 with precise timestamp updates

patterns_discovered.description: Work is organized into distinct phases with current phase tracking
patterns_discovered.evidence: Phase transitioning from 'Fix Event Args Structure' to 'Update Rename Implementation'

gotchas_discovered.description: The actual implementation of 'DirectoryRenamed event invocation to pass new path' is not visible in the diff
gotchas_discovered.impact: Cannot verify if the DirectoryRenamed event actually receives the new path parameter

gotchas_discovered.description: The commit only shows changes to the status tracking file, not the actual source code
gotchas_discovered.impact: The real implementation changes are in a different file or not yet shown in this diff

gotchas_discovered.description: Phase transitions between 'Fix Event Args Structure' and 'Update Rename Implementation' suggest ongoing refactoring work
gotchas_discovered.impact: May indicate work is not well-scoped or phases are being redefined

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully transitioned from planning to building phase with first subtask completion

recommendations.recommendation: Include actual source code changes in session data, not just status file updates
recommendations.rationale: Only status changes are visible, making it impossible to verify implementation correctness

recommendations.rationale: Cannot confirm the core requirement was met without seeing the actual implementation

recommendations.recommendation: Document the relationship between phases and subtasks to clarify work organization
recommendations.rationale: Phase naming ('Fix Event Args Structure' vs 'Update Rename Implementation') suggests scope confusion

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding completion percentage or velocity metrics to the status file
recommendations.rationale: Would help identify if 10-subtask task is realistic and on track
